COMMENT: Jodhpur; Rajasthan; World's largest operational solar park with a massive 2245 MW capacity
Kutch; Gujarat; Massive 30 GW hybrid solar and wind park currently under construction (set to be world's largest)
Tumkur; Karnataka; 2050 MW solar park also known as Shakti Sthala spread across 13000 acres
Kanyakumari; Tamil Nadu; India's largest operational onshore wind farm with a capacity of 1500 MW
Jaisalmer; Rajasthan; Major 1064 MW wind farm developed by Suzlon Energy
Kurnool; Andhra Pradesh; 1000 MW operational solar park utilizing over 4 million solar panels
Rewa; Madhya Pradesh; 750 MW solar park notable for supplying direct power to the Delhi Metro
Patan; Gujarat; One of India's earliest multi-developer solar parks with 730 MW capacity
Ramanathapuram; Tamil Nadu; 648 MW solar project completed by Adani Group in a single location
Anantapur; Andhra Pradesh; 978 MW capacity operational solar park in the Galiveedu mandal
Satara; Maharashtra; India's largest completed hydroelectric power plant generating 1960 MW
Tehri Garhwal; Uttarakhand; Tallest dam in India generating 2400 MW of renewable hydro energy
Dhule; Maharashtra; 528 MW wind farm situated in the Khandesh region
Sangli; Maharashtra; 278 MW prominent wind energy project in western India
Shahdol; Madhya Pradesh; 425 MW hydro project on the Sone River
Kinnaur; Himachal Pradesh; 1500 MW run-of-the-river hydro project on the Sutlej River
